title: Subpart 40-2 - Performance Standards and Minimum Requirements for Core Public Health Services
content:
Subpart 40-2 - Performance Standards and Minimum Requirements for Core Public Health Services

State Regulations
GENERAL PROVISIONS (§ 40-2.0 to 40-2.3)
FAMILY HEATLH (§ 40-2.10 to 40-2.11)
COMMUNICABLE DISEASE CONTROL (§ 40-2.20 to 40-2.24)
CHRONIC DISEASE PREVENTION (§ 40-2.30)
COMMUNITY HEALTH ASSESSMENT (§ 40-2.40)
ENVIRONMENTAL HEALTH (§ 40-2.50 to 40-2.59)
ENVIRONMENTAL HEALTH - ONLY WHERE AUTHORIZED (§ 40-2.60 to 40-2.62)
EMERGENCY PREPAREDNESS AND RESPONSE (§ 40-2.70)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
